StarGen

v2.0

Welcome to StarGen

Stargen is a a random solar system generator, derived from the work of a great number of people over the past three dozen years. (See Credits.txt for details). It's falled StarGen because there are already enough versions that call themselves starform to be confusing.
It can be use for Celestia, space games, etc.

Contact

For the version 2 (visual C++) :

mailto:sphinxgame@noos.fr

Participation

If you are interrested, you can help to the developpment of Stargen II in different ways:
  • if you are a native english, you can help to correct the comments and documentation.
  • if you are an astronom, or a scifi fan, you can test the models, and send your comments on the tests you made, or on the formulas used.
  • if you are a coder, you can add a new class to support new export file formats (ie: html format or celestia format, ...)
